name: Queen Eva

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally C. RATE in all Battles by 19%.

skills.name: Cauterize
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +15%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Damage +20%

skills.name: Ancient Curse
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 4 Damage +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Energy Drain
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Decreases the Turn Meter by 20%. Resets the cooldowns on each of this Champion's skills if any target is killed. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
